file_insights.changes_summary: Added import and state for ReliabilityDetailsModal, created clickable reliability badge
key_modifications: Transformed reliability badge into an interactive button

file_insights.changes_summary: Created new component for displaying machine reliability details

patterns_discovered: Accessibility-focused UI with multiple interaction modes
gotchas_discovered: Complex state management with multiple derived values
Potential performance issues with multiple useEffect and useMemo
Error handling complexity in async operations
Need for careful token management in API requests
recommendations: Consider performance optimization for the large component
Add more comprehensive unit and integration tests
Consider extracting some complex logic into custom hooks
Implement proper TypeScript typing for better type safety
